OEM Technical Representation for crane equipment and comprehensive solutions for shipboard mechanical systems

Contact Us

Based in Chesapeake, Virginia, we are a veteran-owned firm dedicated to marine hydraulics repair.

Our services extend to the installation and maintenance of cranes, cargo handling equipment, deck and hull machinery, and marine hydraulics.

Additionally, we provide OEM Technical Representation for crane equipment and comprehensive solutions for the installation and repair of various shipboard mechanical systems.
